name: T2 Art Works (Tony Taka) LoRA
description:
This LoRA generates images based on the style of Tony Taka's artwork for the Shining series.

I've tested it with a few models, including AOM2 and 7th Anime, and it works well.

modelVersions.description:
This was trained on 586 images with 5 repeats for 6 epochs with a batch size of 4.

There are no trigger keywords in this version.

meta.prompt:
<lora:shining:1> 
1girl, solo, blonde hair, (own hands together, own hands clasped,:1) long hair, sky, tree, day, gloves, hairband, open mouth, smile, cloud,  ribbon, capelet, frills, wavy hair, outdoors, white gloves, snow, :d, upper body, nature, blue sky, bangs, forest, brown eyes, hair between eyes, red ribbon, happy, breasts, winter, braid, (evil smile:1.6)
